titles: The blacke rod, and the vvhite rod (justice and mercie,) striking, and sparing, [brace] London.
author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.
publisher: Printed by B.A. and T.F. for Iohn Covvper,
notes: Running title: The blacke and white rod.
Attributed to Dekker by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
